member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.IFilterEffect
member.summary: Represents the filter effect.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IFilterEffect.Reveal
member.summary: Get the filter effect reveal type

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.GrowShrink, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is filter effect If (TypeOf behavior Is FilterEffect) Then 'Assign the filter effect values Dim filterEffect As FilterEffect = TryCast(behavior,FilterEffect) filterEffect.Reveal = FilterEffectRevealType.[In] Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IFilterEffect.Type
member.summary: Get the type of filter effect

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.GrowShrink, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is filter effect If (TypeOf behavior Is FilterEffect) Then 'Assign the filter effect values Dim filterEffect As FilterEffect = TryCast(behavior,FilterEffect) filterEffect.Type = FilterEffectType.Dissolve Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IFilterEffect.Subtype
member.summary: Get the subtype of filter effect

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.GrowShrink, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is filter effect If (TypeOf behavior Is FilterEffect) Then 'Assign the filter effect values Dim filterEffect As FilterEffect = TryCast(behavior,FilterEffect) filterEffect.Subtype = SubtypeFilterEffect.None Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionCmdPath
member.summary: Represents the motion command path.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionCmdPath.CommandType
member.summary: Get the command type of motion effect

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path(0).CommandType = MotionCommandPathType.MoveTo; Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionCmdPath.IsRelative
member.summary: Get the relative value

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path(0).IsRelative = false; Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionCmdPath.Points
member.summary: Get the path values in points

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) Dim points As PointF() = path(0).Points Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionCmdPath.PointsType
member.summary: Get the points type value of motion effect

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path(0).PointsType = MotionPathPointsType.Auto; Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionPath
member.summary: Represents the motion path.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionPath.Add(Syncfusion.Presentation.MotionCommandPathType,System.Drawing.PointF[],Syncfusion.Presentation.MotionPathPointsType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add the motion path values into the list
member.param: Check bool value of relative coordination
member.returns: Return the newly added path

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path.Add(MotionCommandPathType.LineTo, points, MotionPathPointsType.CurveSmooth, false) Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionPath.Clear
member.summary: Clear the motion command path values from the list

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path.Clear() Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionPath.Insert(System.Int32,Syncfusion.Presentation.MotionCommandPathType,System.Drawing.PointF[],Syncfusion.Presentation.MotionPathPointsType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Insert the motion path into list with particular index.
member.param: Index to insert motion path value
Check bool value of relative coordination

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path.Insert(2, MotionCommandPathType.CurveTo, points, MotionPathPointsType.Smooth, false) Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionPath.Remove(Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionCmdPath)
member.summary: Remove the particular motion command path value
member.param: Command path item to remove from the collection

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.PathCrescentMoon, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is motion effect If (TypeOf behavior Is MotionEffect) Then 'Assign the motion effect values Dim motionEffect As MotionEffect = TryCast(behavior,MotionEffect) Dim path As MotionPath = TryCast(motionEffect.Path, MotionPath) path.Remove(path(1)) Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Presentation.IMotionPath.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove the particular motion path with index value
member.param: Remove the particular path from collection using index

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.GrowShrink, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors If TypeOf behavior Is ScaleEffect Then 'Assign the scale effect values Dim scaleEffect As ScaleEffect = TryCast(behavior, ScaleEffect) Dim point As New PointF() point.X = 400 point.Y = 500 scaleEffect.From = point Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.GrowShrink, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is scale effect If (TypeOf behavior Is ScaleEffect) Then 'Assign the scale effect values Dim scaleEffect As ScaleEffect = TryCast(behavior, ScaleEffect) Dim point As New PointF() point.X = 400 point.Y = 500 scaleEffect.[To] = point Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.ISetEffect.To
member.summary: Get the To value of set effect

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.ChangeFillColor, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the behaviors list from the effect Dim behaviors As IBehaviors = effect.Behaviors 'Get behavior using foreach loop For Each behavior As Behavior In behaviors 'Check condition for behavior is set effect If (TypeOf behavior Is SetEffect) Then 'Assign the set effect values Dim setEffect As SetEffect = TryCast(behavior,SetEffect) setEffect.[To] = "solid" Exit For End If Next 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.summary: Get the trigger delay time value of timing property

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.ChangeFillColor, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the Timing properties of effect and assign it in new Timing property Dim time As Timing = TryCast(effect.Timing, Timing) 'Assign the Set effect Accelerate property time.TriggerDelayTime = 20 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.ITiming.TriggerType
member.summary: Get the trigger type value of timing property

example.code: 'Create a new presentation Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create 'Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) 'Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) 'Add animation effect on the slide with shape Dim effect As IEffect = ppDoc.Slides(0).TimeLine.MainSequence.AddEffect(shape, EffectType.ChangeFillColor, EffectSubtype.None, EffectTriggerType.OnClick) 'Get the Timing properties of effect and assign it in new Timing property Dim time As Timing = TryCast(effect.Timing, Timing) 'Assign the Set effect Accelerate property time.TriggerType = EffectTriggerType.OnClick 'Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") 'Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition
member.summary: Represents the slide show transition.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.TriggerOnClick
member.summary: Get the Slide Transition Mouse On Click value

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Set the mouse on click bool value slide.SlideTransition.TriggerOnClick = true ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.TriggerOnTimeDelay
member.summary: Get the Next Slide Advance Time Check Value

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Set the next slide advance time bool value slide.SlideTransition.TriggerOnTimeDelay = True ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.TimeDelay
member.summary: Get the advance time value for navigating to next slide.
member.remarks: Max Advance time value is 86399.

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Set the next slide advance time bool value slide.SlideTransition.TriggerOnTimeDelay = True ' Set the advance on time value for next slide slide.SlideTransition.TimeDelay = 25000 ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.Duration
member.summary: Get the Duration of the Slide Transition.
member.remarks: Max Duration is 59 seconds(0 to 59).

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Set the duration value(in seconds) for slide transition effect slide.SlideTransition.Duration = 30 ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.TransitionEffect
member.summary: Get the Transition effect type

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.TransitionEffectOption
member.summary: Get the Transition effect SubType(Direction)

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Add subtype for the transition effect slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffectOption = TransitionEffectOption.Right ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Presentation.Interfaces.ISlideShowTransition.Speed
member.summary: Get the Speed of the Transition effect
member.remarks: Transition duration value will change based on speed. The duration values are Fast - 0.5 sec, Medium - 0.75 sec, Slow - 1.0 sec

example.code: ' Create a new presentation. Dim ppDoc As IPresentation = Presentation.Create() ' Add a slide to the presentation. Dim slide As ISlide = ppDoc.Slides.Add(SlideLayoutType.Blank) ' Add shape on the slide Dim shape As IShape = slide.Shapes.AddShape(AutoShapeType.Diamond, 150, 150, 250, 150) ' Add slide transition effect on the slide slide.SlideTransition.TransitionEffect = TransitionEffect.PageCurlDouble ' Add the speed value for the transition effect slide.SlideTransition.Speed = TransitionSpeed.Slow ' Save the presentation file ppDoc.Save("Sample.pptx") ' Close the presentation file ppDoc.Close()
